title: Exponents: a study in generalisation
creator_credit: Ray Redheffer, Stephen Slocomb, Charles Eames and Ray Eames
brief_description: Animated symbols are used to explain the powers of a number and the use of the exponent in expanded notation. This film has no dialogue and relies entirely on animated visual illustrations to define exponents.
creator_credit_for_label: Ray Redheffer, Stephen Slocomb, Charles Eames and Ray Eames
